ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Dead-in-Tow Locomotive/Passenger Cars Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Dead-in-Tow Locomotive/Passenger Cars') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, OR( ISBLANK( NS_InspectionDate__c ) , ISBLANK(NS_MechanicalApproval__c) , ISBLANK(NS_PACTICHD__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Inspection Date, Mechanical Approval, and PACT/ICHD Date prior to closing the Case.
